name: vhr-vehicle-service
description: A Lambda function for the vehicle microservice

scripts.test: env VEHICLE_ANOMALY_TBL='tblanomaly' VEHICLE_OWNER_TBL='tblowner' HEALTH_REPORT_TBL='tblhealthreport' mocha lib/*.spec.js
scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/lib
scripts.build:copy: cp index.js dist/ && cp -r lib/*.js dist/lib
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
